block-definition.comment: Sets the value of an existing property or inserts it anew.

inputs.input: backColorRedtypeOfData backColorRed backColorGreen backColorBlue leftOffset upperOffset lowerOffset title titleHeight xLabel xLabelHeight yLabel yLabelHeight xLeft xRight yLower yUpper lineStyle lineWidth lineColorRed lineColorGreen lineColorBlue datapointStyle datapointWidth datapointConnected datapointColorRed datapointColorGreen datapointColorBlue scalesPrecision scalesXtextheight scalesYtextheight scalesNumberXintervals scalesNumberYintervals

block-definition.comment: Reads the value of an existing property.

inputs.input: backColorRedtypeOfData backColorRed backColorGreen backColorBlue leftOffset upperOffset lowerOffset title titleHeight xLabel xLabelHeight yLabel yLabelHeight xLeft xRight yLower yUpper lineStyle lineWidth lineColorRed lineColorGreen lineColorBlue datapointStyle datapointWidth datapointConnected datapointColorRed datapointColorGreen datapointColorBlue scalesPrecision scalesXtextheight scalesYtextheight scalesNumberXintervals scalesNumberYintervals

block-definition.comment: Sets the default values of the properties of a PlotSprite.
Sets the labels of the diagrams of a PlotSprite.
Sets the distances of the diagram axes to the edges of the PlotSprite.
Sets the ranges for the axes of the diagrams of a PlotSprite.

block.l: Cannot set default plot ranges: no data given!

block-definition.comment: Reads property groups of a PlotSprite (especially to shorten calls of JavaScript functions).

inputs.input: labelsranges labels back-color offsets line-attributes datapoint-attributes scale-attributes

block-definition.comment: Draws and labels the axes of a PlotSprite.

block.l: function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function drawScales() { var dx=(xRight-xLeft)/xIntervals, delta=xTOxp(dx)-x0, xpos=x0; var w,text; while(xpos>=0){xpos=xpos-delta;} while(xpos<0){xpos=xpos+delta;} var x=xpTOx(xpos); ctx.lineWidth = 1; ctx.fillStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.strokeStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.font = ""+xtextheight+"px sans-serif"; while(xpos<=diagramWidth){ text=x.toPrecision(n); w= ctx.measureText(text).width; ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,diagramHeight-3+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,diagramHeight+upperOffset); ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,1+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,3+upperOffset); if(xpos<diagramWidth-10){ctx.fillText(text,xpos-w/2+leftOffset,diagramHeight+xtextheight+3+upperOffset);} xpos=xpos+delta; x=xpTOx(xpos); } var dy=(yUpper-yLower)/yIntervals, delta=y0-yTOyp(dy), ypos=y0; while(ypos>=0){ypos=ypos-delta;} ctx.font = ""+ytextheight+"px sans-serif"; ypos=ypos+delta; var y=ypTOy(ypos); while(ypos<=diagramHeight){ text=y.toPrecision(n); w= ctx.measureText(text).width; ctx.moveTo(1+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(3+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.moveTo(rightCostumeEdge-3,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(rightCostumeEdge,ypos+upperOffset); if(ypos>10){ctx.fillText(text,leftOffset-25-w/2,ypos+3+upperOffset);} ypos=ypos+delta; y=ypTOy(ypos); } } //variables var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters var xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)), xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)), yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)), yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); var upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)), lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)), leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)), n=Number(scaleattributes.at(1)), xtextheight=Number(scaleattributes.at(2)),xIntervals=Number(scaleattributes.at(3)), ytextheight=Number(scaleattributes.at(4)),yIntervals=Number(scaleattributes.at(5)); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight,w; var r=backcolor.at(1), g=backcolor.at(2), b=backcolor.at(3); //clear label regions ctx.beginPath(); ctx.fillStyle = new Color(r,g,b).toString(); ctx.strokeStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.lineWidth=1; ctx.fillRect(0,0,rightCostumeEdge,upperOffset-1); ctx.fillRect(0,0,leftOffset-1,lowerCostumeEdge); ctx.fillRect(0,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset+1,rightCostumeEdge,lowerCostumeEdge); ctx.strokeRect(0,0,rightCostumeEdge,lowerCostumeEdge); //draw labels ctx.fillStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); if(upperOffset>0){ ctx.moveTo(leftOffset,upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(rightCostumeEdge-1,upperOffset); ctx.font = ""+labels.at(4)+"px sans-serif"; var w= ctx.measureText(labels.at(1)).width; ctx.fillText(labels.at(1),rightCostumeEdge/2-w/2,22); } ctx.moveTo(leftOffset,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset); ctx.lineTo(rightCostumeEdge,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset); if(labels.at(2).length>0){ ctx.font = ""+labels.at(5)+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText(labels.at(2)).width; ctx.fillText(labels.at(2),diagramWidth/2+leftOffset-w/2,lowerCostumeEdge-6); } ctx.moveTo(leftOffset,upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(leftOffset,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset); if(labels.at(3).length>0){ ctx.font = ""+labels.at(6)+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText(labels.at(3)).width; ctx.rotate(-Math.PI/2); ctx.fillText(labels.at(3),-w/2-lowerCostumeEdge/2,17); ctx.rotate(Math.PI/2); } drawScales(); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke();

block-definition.s: $poster add dataplot with numeric scales of %'data'
block-definition.comment: Draws the data points of a two-dimensional table with numerical values.

block.l: from "add numeric dataplot": no data found

function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function round(x,n){return Math.round(x*Math.pow(10,n))/Math.pow(10,n);} function randomInt(min,max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1)+min);} function plotData(){ var i=0,linewidth=lineattributes.at(2),linestyle=1,datawidth=dataattributes.at(2),datastyle=1; var arraydata=data.asArray(),xpos,ypos,xpOld,ypOld,w; if( lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='continuous') linestyle=1; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dashed') linestyle=2; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dash-dot') linestyle=3; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dot-dot') linestyle=4; else if (lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='none') linestyle=0; if( dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'o circle') datastyle=1; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== '._point') datastyle=2; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()=='*_asterix') datastyle=3; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== '+_plus') datastyle=4; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'x_ex') datastyle=5; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'square') datastyle=6; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'triangle') datastyle=7; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'none') datastyle=0; ctx.strokeStyle=new Color(lineattributes.at(3),lineattributes.at(4),lineattributes.at(5)).toString(); ctx.fillStyle=new Color(dataattributes.at(3),dataattributes.at(4),dataattributes.at(5)).toString(); ctx.lineWidth = linewidth; if( linestyle==2){ctx.setLineDash([10,5]);} else if(linestyle==3){ctx.setLineDash([10,2,1,2]);} else if(linestyle==4){ctx.setLineDash([1,2]);} else {ctx.setLineDash([]);} if(arraydata.length>0){ xpOld= xTOxp(arraydata[0].at(1)); ypOld=yTOyp(arraydata[0].at(2)); } while(i<arraydata.length){ xpos=xTOxp(arraydata[i].at(1)); ypos=yTOyp(arraydata[i].at(2)); // DRAW LINE? if(linestyle > 0 && i>0){ ctx.beginPath(); ctx.moveTo(xpOld+leftOffset,ypOld+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); } // DRAW MARKER? if(datastyle > 0){ ctx.beginPath(); if( datastyle==1) ctx.arc(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,datawidth/2,0,6.28318531); else if(datastyle==2) ctx.arc(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,2,0,6.28318531); else if(datastyle==3) { ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("*").width; ctx.fillText("*",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } else if(datastyle==4){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("+").width; ctx.fillText("+",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } else if(datastyle==5){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("X").width; ctx.fillText("X",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } else if(datastyle==6){ ctx.fillRect(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2,datawidth,datawidth); ctx.strokeRect(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2,datawidth,datawidth); } else if(datastyle==7){ ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset+datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2); } ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); } xpOld=xpos; ypOld=ypos; i=i+1; } ctx.setLineDash([]); } // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)); xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)); yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)); yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)); lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)); leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)); var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight; plotData();

block-definition.s: $poster add dataplot with text und numerical scale of %'data'
block-definition.comment: Draws the data points of a two-dimensional table with numerical and text values.

block.l: from "add mixed dataplot": wrong data format

function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function round(x,n){return Math.round(x*Math.pow(10,n))/Math.pow(10,n);} function randomInt(min,max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1)+min);} function plotData(){ var i=0,linewidth=lineattributes.at(2),linestyle=1,datawidth=dataattributes.at(2),datastyle=1, connected=dataattributes.at(3),dx,x; var arraydata=data.asArray(),xpos,ypos,xpOld,ypOld,w; if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='continuous') linestyle = 1; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dashed') linestyle = 2; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dash-dot') linestyle = 3; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dot-dot') linestyle = 4; if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'o circle') datastyle=1; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== '._point') datastyle=2; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()=='*_asterix') datastyle=3; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== '+_plus') datastyle=4; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'x_ex') datastyle=5; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'square') datastyle=6; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'triangle') datastyle=7; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'none') datastyle=8; else datastyle=1; ctx.strokeStyle=new Color(lineattributes.at(3),lineattributes.at(4),lineattributes.at(5)).toString(); ctx.fillStyle=new Color(dataattributes.at(4),dataattributes.at(5),dataattributes.at(6)).toString(); ctx.lineWidth = linewidth; if(linestyle==2){ctx.setLineDash([10,5]);} else if(linestyle==3){ctx.setLineDash([10,2,1,2]);} else if(linestyle==4){ctx.setLineDash([1,2]);} else{ctx.setLineDash([]);} if(arraydata.length>0){ dx=(xRight-xLeft)/arraydata.length; x=xLeft+dx/2.0; xpOld= xTOxp(x); ypOld=yTOyp(arraydata[0].at(2)); } while(i<arraydata.length){ xpos=xTOxp(x); ypos=yTOyp(arraydata[i].at(2)); if(connected && i>0){ ctx.beginPath(); ctx.moveTo(xpOld+leftOffset,ypOld+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); } ctx.beginPath(); if(datastyle==1){ ctx.arc(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,datawidth/2,0,6.283185307179586476925286766559); } if(datastyle==2){ ctx.arc(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,2,0,6.283185307179586476925286766559); } if(datastyle==3){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("*").width; ctx.fillText("*",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==4){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("+").width; ctx.fillText("+",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==5){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("X").width; ctx.fillText("X",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==6){ ctx.fillRect(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2,datawidth,datawidth); ctx.strokeRect(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2,datawidth,datawidth); } if(datastyle==7){ ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset+datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==0){ ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset+1); } ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); xpOld=xpos; ypOld=ypos; i=i+1; x=x+dx; } ctx.setLineDash([]); } // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)); xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)); yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)); yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)); lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)); leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)); var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight; plotData();

block-definition.comment: Draws a histogram of the data.

block.l: var delta=(max-min)/n, result=new Array(n), h=min+delta/2; for(var i=0;i<n;i++){ result[i]=new List([h,0]); h=h+delta; } for(var i=1;i<=data.length();i++){ h=Math.ceil((data.at(i)-min)/delta); if(h<1) h=1; else if(h>n) h=n; result[h-1]=new List([result[h-1].at(1),Number(result[h-1].at(2))+1]); } return new List(result);

custom-block.s: $poster set line attributes style %s width %n %br color %n %n %n
$poster set scale attributes precision %n textheight x %n y %n %br number of x-intervals %n number of y-intervals %n

block.l: function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function plotHistogram(){ var i=0,linestyle=1, arraydata=data.asArray(), xpos=5, deltaX=(diagramWidth-1)/data.contents.length; ctx.strokeStyle=new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.fillStyle=new Color(lineattributes.at(3),lineattributes.at(4),lineattributes.at(5)).toString(); ctx.lineWidth = lineattributes.at(2); if(deltaX<1) deltaX=1; while(i<arraydata.length){ ypos=yTOyp(arraydata[i].at(2)); ctx.beginPath(); ctx.fillRect(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-lowerOffset,deltaX,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-ypos); ctx.strokeRect(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-lowerOffset,deltaX,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-ypos); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); i=i+1; xpos=xpos+deltaX } } // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)); xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)); yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)); yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)); upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)); lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)); var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight; plotHistogram();

block-definition.comment: Calculates the ranges of two columns of a table

block.l: var xmin,xmax,ymin,ymax,valx,valy,i; if(table.contents.length<1) return "bad data"; xmin=Number(table.at(1).at(1)); xmax=xmin; ymin=Number(table.at(1).at(2)); ymax=ymin; i=2; while(i<=table.contents.length){ valx=Number(table.at(i).at(1)); valy=Number(table.at(i).at(2)); if(valx<xmin) xmin=valx; if(valx>xmax) xmax=valx; if(valy<ymin) ymin=valy; if(valy>ymax) ymax=valy; i++; } return new List([xmin,xmax,ymin,ymax]);

block-definition.s: $poster set line attributes style %'style' width %'width' $nl color %'r' %'g' %'b'
block-definition.comment: Sets line style and color for PlotSprite diagrams.

block-definition.s: $poster set datapoint attributes style %'style' width %'width' color %'r' %'g' %'b'
block-definition.comment: Sets the properties for the data points for the diagrams of a PlotSprite.

block-definition.s: $poster set scale attributes precision %'precision' textheight x %'xtextheight' y %'ytextheight' $nl number of x-intervals %'n' number of y-intervals %'m'
block-definition.comment: Sets the properties for scales.
Returns the copy of the current sprite-costume.
Draws the graph of a function given as rigified Snap!-function or coefficient-list of a polynomial.

block.l: function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function round(x,n){return Math.round(x*Math.pow(10,n))/Math.pow(10,n);} function randomInt(min,max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1)+min);} function myFunction(f,x){ if(f instanceof List){ var grade = f.length(),result; if(grade==0) return 0; else if(grade==1) return Number(f.at(1)); else{ result=Number(f.at(1))*Number(x)+Number(f.at(2)); for(var i=3;i<=grade;i++) result = result*Number(x)+Number(f.at(i)); return result; } } else return proc.reportAtomicMap(f,new List([x])).at(1); //copied from Snap!-code } function plotFunction(f,r,g,b,){ var xpos,ypos,x,y,xpOld,ypOld,plottedDots=0,missingDots=0,style=1, modus = 1; //firstLineattribute=lineattributes.at(1).split(" ")[0]; if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='continuous') style = 1; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dashed') style = 2; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dash-dot') style = 3; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dot-dot') style = 4; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.strokeStyle=new Color(r,g,b).toString(); ctx.fillStyle=new Color(r,g,b).toString(); ctx.lineWidth = lineattributes.at(2); xpOld=0; x=xpTOx(xpOld); y=myFunction(f,x); ypOld=yTOyp(y); xpos=1; while(xpos<=diagramWidth){ x=xpTOx(xpos); y=myFunction(f,x); ypos=yTOyp(y); if(modus>0) { ctx.moveTo(xpOld+leftOffset,ypOld+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); if(style>1) plottedDots++; } else missingDots++; xpOld=xpos; ypOld=ypos; xpos=xpos+1; if(style==2){ if((modus==1) && (plottedDots>3)) {modus = 0; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==0) && (missingDots>2)) {modus = 1; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} } if(style==3){ if((modus==1) && (plottedDots>3)) {modus = 0; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==0) && (missingDots>0)) {modus = 2; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==2) && (plottedDots>0)) {modus = -1; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==-1) && (missingDots>0)) {modus = 1; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} } if(style==4){ if((modus==1) && (plottedDots>0)) {modus = 0; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==0) && (missingDots>0)) {modus = 1; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} } } ctx.closePath(); //ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); } // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)); xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)); yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)); yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)); lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)); leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)); var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight; plotFunction(aFunction,Number(lineattributes.at(3)),Number(lineattributes.at(4)),Number(lineattributes.at(5)));

block-definition.comment: Creates a temporary PlotSprite with the required local variables,.
Conversion of coordinates
Obtaining data with the mouse.
Test on vector, matrix or table.

block.l: var result=true; i=1; while(result && (i<=data.length())) { row=data.at(i); if(!(row instanceof List)) result=false; else if(row.length()!=1) result=false; else if(Number.isNaN(row.at(1))) result=false; i++; } return result;

var result=true,row,i,j,width; i=1; while(result && (i<=data.length())) { row=data.at(i); if(!(row instanceof List)) result=false; else { if(i==1) width = row.length(); if(width==1) result=false; if(row.length()!=width) result=false; else { j=1; while(result && (j<=row.length())) { if(Number.isNaN(row.at(j))) result=false; j++; } } } i++; } return result;

var result=true,row,i,width; i=1; while(result && (i<=data.length())) { row=data.at(i); if(!(row instanceof List)) result=false; else { if(i==1) width = row.length(); if(row.length()!=width) result=false; } i++; } return result;

var newCostume=new Costume(); newCostume.contents.width = w; newCostume.contents.height = h; var ctx = newCostume.contents.getContext('2d'); ctx.beginPath(); ctx.fillStyle = new Color(r,g,b).toString(); ctx.strokeStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.fillRect(0,0,w,h); ctx.strokeRect(0,0,w,h); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); newCostume.rotationCenter=new Point(w/2,h/2); return newCostume;

block-definition.comment: Better scaling. Thanks to Rick Hessman!

custom-block.s: $poster set datapoint attributes style %s width %n color %n %n %n
$poster set line attributes style %s width %n %br color %n %n %n
$poster add dataplot with numeric scales of %s
$poster set scale attributes precision %n textheight x %n y %n %br number of x-intervals %n number of y-intervals %n
